summary: Comprehensive testing of BluBridge HRMS Admin Module completed successfully. All major features tested including login, dashboard, employee management, leave management, star rewards, team management, and reports. Backend APIs working at 100% success rate, frontend UI fully functional with proper integration.
passed_tests: Admin login with admin/admin credentials
Dashboard summary cards (Total Research Unit: 16, Upcoming Leaves: 0, Pending Approvals: 0, Total Support Staff: 2)
Dashboard attendance overview tabs with dynamic data loading
Dashboard filter section with date range and leave type filters
Dashboard leave list table showing employee details
Employee Management CRUD operations and slide panel forms
Employee search and filtering functionality
Employee pagination and export functionality
Leave Management request and history tabs
Leave filtering and search capabilities
Star Reward page with grid view and CSV export
Team page with department tabs and team cards with member counts
Reports page with attendance and leave report generation
Responsive sidebar navigation between all pages
All backend API endpoints (31/31 tests passed)
Authentication and authorization
Dashboard statistics and leave list APIs
Employee CRUD operations
Attendance tracking and statistics
Leave request creation and approval workflow
Star reward system
Team and department management
Report generation (attendance and leave reports)
Configuration endpoints
Audit logging
